item.title: Pepe Coin Leads Crypto Recovery; PEPE Price Jumps By 5%
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
The crypto ecosystem is in recovery mode after a tumultuous week that saw more than $1 billion removed from the market thus far. While this recovery is being fueled by Bitcoin (BTC) whose losses are shrinking at the time of writing, PEPE’s bullish moves are also fueling the potential upsurge of altcoins. The PEPE Intrigue

item.title: Just-In: Kraken Allows PayPal Stablecoin (PYUSD) Trading
item.dc:creator: Kelvin Munene Murithi
item.description:
Crypto exchange Kraken has confirmed it will begin trading PayPal’s stablecoin, PayPal (PYUSD) from August 21, further solidifying the stablecoin’s growing presence in the digital asset market. The support encompasses deposits and withdrawals, with the caveat that transactions must be worth at least $5.00 and confined to the Ethereum blockchain. Kraken’s decision follows several other

The post Just-In: Kraken Allows PayPal Stablecoin (PYUSD) Trading appeared first on CoinGape.

item.description:

item.title: Shiba Inu Lead Developer Promises Scaling Shibarium By 1500%
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Shiba Inu lead developer Shytoshi Kusama on Saturday published a second update regarding Shibarium network status and its scaling. Shytoshi Kusama weighs in on preparing the Layer-2 chain for massive traffic, scaling, and decentralization after internal testing. Shiba Inu ecosystem tokens SHIB and LEASH prices have jumped again.
